text: Since the creation of the office of Prime Minister in 1977, there have been 6 official prime ministers. The Prime Minister is the head of government of Djibouti. The current Prime Minister is Abdoulkader Kamil Mohamed, since 2013. ==List of officeholders== ;Political parties Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office • French Territory of the Afars and the Issas (1967–1977) 1 Ali Aref Bourhan 1968 1973 7 July 1967 29 July 1976 2 Abdallah Mohamed Kamil — 29 July 1976 18 May 1977 3 Hassan Gouled Aptidon 1977 18 May 1977 27 June 1977 • Republic of Djibouti (1977–present) • 1 Hassan Gouled Aptidon — 27 June 1977 12 July 1977 2 Ahmed Dini Ahmed — 12 July 1977 5 February 1978 3 Abdallah Mohamed Kamil — 5 February 1978 2 October 1978 4 Barkat Gourad Hamadou 1982 1987 1992 1997 2 October 1978 7 March 2001 RPP 5 Dileita Mohamed Dileita 2003 2008 7 March 2001 1 April 2013 RPP 6 Abdoulkader Kamil Mohamed 2013 2018 2023 1 April 2013 Incumbent RPP ==References== *
title: Prime Minister of Djibouti
